m.new_content.body: for the inclusion group I'm trying to document what the chairs' responsibilities are as matrix channel admins;

content.body: e.g. giving delegates the appropriate permissions in this channel
does it go to the chairs when someone clicks "Report content" on a message?
do the chairs moderate the channels and mute/ban spammers and trolls?
Aki: bterlson: Rob Palmer: let me know if you can think of other matrix admin responsibilities that the chairs should have
content.formatted_body: Aki: bterlson: Rob Palmer: let me know if you can think of other matrix admin responsibilities that the chairs should have

content.body: (and we have some non-chair admins as well; is this temporary or is it good for the chairs to delegate admin-ship to volunteers?)
i would hope CoC folk also have ability to moderate
